subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Carlos Moyá of Spain and Andrei Pavel of Romania advanced to the final of the Croatia Open.Moyá has a chance to win the tournament for the fifth time after defeating Argentina’s Guillermo Cañas, 6-3, 6-2, in one semifinal. Pavel defeated the Serbian qualifier Viktor Troicki, 6-3, 6-3.
